creator: carlo.bramix@libero.it
text:
Created attachment 30876
Fix for this ticket

CYGWIN is a POSIX environment that it runs on Windows.
For this reason, the file extension for an external module must be ".dll" and not ".so".

Attached patch fixes this bug.

Sincerely,

Carlo Bramini

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: Committed to trunk in r1529554...  I plan to test this with apr-util 1.5.x soon.

Merged to apr-util-1.5.x with r1529675.

Thanks!
creator: trawick@apache.org
